vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.38.29;
son of: Judah (H3063) and Tamar (H8559);
brother of: Zerah (H2226I);
half-brother of: Er (H6147), Onan (H0209) and Shelah (H7956);
father of: Hezron (H2696H) and Hamul (H2538)
Group of pe.rets (פֶּ֫רֶץ "Perez" H6557)
§ Pharzites = see Pharez "breach"
the descendants of Pharez, the son of Judah by Tamar
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Fares, hijo de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
法勒斯族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 法勒斯
猶大與他瑪的兒子法勒斯的後裔(民 26:20)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
法勒斯族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 法勒斯
犹大与他玛的儿子法勒斯的后裔(民 26:20)
